price: И када неком од њих смрт дође, он узвикне: „Господару мој, поврати ме,
arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَ أَحَدَهُمُ ٱلۡمَوۡتُ قَالَ رَبِّ ٱرۡجِعُونِ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ḥattā idhā jāa aḥadahumu al-mawtu qāla rabbi ir'jiʿūni
